agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Administration TIME & DATE: 11:00 AM or upon adjournment Wednesday, January 23, 2019 PLACE: 2E.20 (Betty King Cmte. Rm.) CHAIR: Senator Bryan Hughes 24 hour posting rule suspended To consider the following: SJR 30 Hughes Proposing a constitutional amendment relating to appropriations for the preservation and perpetuation of certain items of historical value; allowing the legislature and state agencies to accept on behalf of the state gifts of items of historical value and contributions to purchase such items. SB 409 Hughes Relating to the creation, purpose, implementation, and funding of the County Park Beautification and Improvement Program.
